channel.title: Talks on Ignasi Barrera
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Ignasi Barrera

item.title: Talks
item.description: Here are some of the talks I’ve delivered recently and in the past few years. All the slides for my talks can be found in Speaker Deck. Do you need a service mesh? CodeMotion Madrid, 2018 In this talk I explored what a service mesh is and what they can do for your microservice web backends. Are the claims of observability, resiliency, and WAF features real? Are they useful during development, production, or both?
